findings.title: SQL Injection via String Concatenation
findings.message: Potential SQL injection vulnerability detected. User input is directly concatenated into SQL query.
findings.remediation: Use prepared statements with parameter binding instead of string concatenation.

findings.title: Local File Inclusion (LFI) Vulnerability
findings.remediation: Validate and sanitize file paths. Use a whitelist of allowed files.

findings.title: Command Injection Vulnerability
findings.remediation: Never pass user input directly to system commands.
